gist.headline: Welcome, Pollenboard
gist.blurb: A new self-hostable frontend has entered the garden. Pollenboard brings images, audio, and text generation together in one cozy interface.
gist.summary: Added Pollenboard, a self-hostable all-in-one frontend for image, audio, and text generation, to the community showcase.
gist.impact: Users can now deploy their own private interface for interacting with all Pollinations APIs.
gist.visual_concept: Pollenboard represents a unified control center. Depict a cozy dashboard setup where the bee and robot are managing different creative streams (art, music, text).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the Bee and the chunky robot admiring a sleek dashboard monitor labeled 'POLLENBOARD'. The screen displays pixel icons for images, text, and audio. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Robot has a happy expression. Wholesome and organized vibes.
